en-ZZ: <i>Run the simulation to collect data based on the information below. Click on a choice to answer the question.</i>
zh-CN: <i>根据以下信息运行模拟，收集数据。点击一个选项回答问题。

en-ZZ: <i>Run the simulation to collect data based on the information below. Click on a choice to answer the question.</i>
zh-CN: <i>根据以下信息运行模拟，收集数据。点击一个选项回答问题。</i>

en-ZZ: <i>For this question you will not need to use the simulation. Click on a choice and then type an explanation to answer the question.</i>
zh-CN: <i>本问题无需进行模拟操作。点击一个选项回答问题，并给出解释。</i>

en-ZZ: <i>Read the introduction. Then click on the NEXT arrow.</i>
zh-CN: <i>阅读背景介绍，然后点击下一步箭头。</i>

en-ZZ: <i>Run the simulation to collect data based on the information below. Click on a choice and then select data in the table to answer the question.</i>
zh-CN: <i>根据以下信息运行模拟，收集数据。点击一个选项，从表格中选取数据回答问题。</i>

en-ZZ: Delete some data to run more trials.
zh-CN: 删除一些数据，进行更多试验。

en-ZZ: The Run button to display the results.
Good!<br /> Please click on the NEXT arrow to continue.
zh-CN: 太棒了！<br /> 请点击“下一步”箭头继续。

en-ZZ: <i> Remember to select <b>one or more</b> boxes.</i>
zh-CN: <i> 注意：本题有<b>一个或多个</b>正确选项。 </i>

en-ZZ: Please click on the NEXT arrow to continue.
zh-CN: 请点击“下一步”箭头继续。

en-ZZ: This simulation allows you to explore the effect of a vaccination on the spread of an infectious disease in a population of people exposed to the disease.
zh-CN: 你可以利用这个模拟来探究在一群接触某种传染性疾病的人当中，接种疫苗对该疾病传播的影响。

en-ZZ: Can this question be answered by scientific experiments?
zh-CN: 通过科学实验，该问题可以得到解答吗？

en-ZZ: <i>Refer to "Antibiotics" on the right. Click on the choices in the table to answer the question.</i>
zh-CN: <i>参考右侧的材料“抗生素”，在表中点击选项回答问题。</i>
